Posts.EditableText: Hi!/I'm new here and just trying to learn how to use Quest. And I was wondering, if moving the order of rooms in text adventure games is possible. I would like to know if I can just move room#3 up above room#1. (Cuz I want the intro or starting page to be from room#3) And if so then how?
Posts.HTML: Hi!/I'm new here and just trying to learn how to use Quest. And I was wondering, if moving the order of rooms in text adventure games is possible. I would like to know if I can just move room#3 up above room#1. (Cuz I want the intro or starting page to be from room#3) And if so then how?

Posts.EditableText:
The order of rooms in a text adventure is irrelevant.

If you want the intro to be from room 3, then move the 'player' object into room 3.

(Assuming you're talking about a text adventure. I don't know how it works in gamebook mode)
Posts.HTML:
